title: 3 and Out - Danny Done, Dak's Slump, Eagles Optimism, Pete Carroll Out, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Danny Done, Dak's Slump, Eagles Optimism, Pete Carroll Out, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to the Bucs MNF drilling of the Giants, and why the G-Men need to move off Daniel Jones and GM Dave Gettleman immediately. Then, he examines if Dak Prescott's recent slump is reason for big picture concern, why he's been so impressed with the Eagles turnaround, why the Harbaugh brothers deserve credit, if Pete Carroll's done in Seattle, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Subscribe NOW and follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates! Check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
